About the Game

â—† Story


In the secret underground slave market, I got the best item of the sale.

Long flowing black hair, beautiful thighs, full breasts.

There seems to be a defiant look in her eyes... But it's also fun to develop a "relationship" with the goods...

â—† Game Features


â—‡ All 60fps Live2 d animation

â—‡ There are 8 types of H-scenes

â—‡ oral sex, passive oral sex, breast sex, normal position, 2 types of backward position, riding position, and 2 types of disorientation rape.

â—‡ About 105 animation files (including expression changes)

â—† Change of status


â—‡ The state will change with the state of conditioning.

â—‡ All the H scenes expressions will become more and more honest.

â—‡ You can continue to play even if you run out of energy and faint!

â—† Note


â—‡The characters in this work are all over 18 years old.

â—‡Cautionï¼šPlease delete the saving data and try again if the game crashes when clicking saving.

data.short_description: Simple and easy to play! Is the discipline SLG game . All scenes are made in 60fps LIVE2D animation!
data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Russian, Turkish, Thai, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Korean
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10/XP
  • Processor: 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work . The game contains Nudity or Sexual Content, Frequent Violence, sexual assault, non-consensual sex, drug abuse, self-harm, General Mature Content.
All characters are over the age of 20.
